attributes.action: Make balancenortheast.co.uk remove false information relating to breast cancer.
attributes.additional_details:
Research by cancer research UK in December 2018 found that only 8% of breast cancers were linked to alcohol consumption.

Many women like myself with a breast cancer diagnosis are not "drinkers" this campaign is extremely insulting to women and does not highlight the six main cancers that can be caused by drinking alcohol
attributes.background: Advertising propeganda being produced by balancenortheast.co.uk is factually inaccurate and insulting to the many women living with a breast cancer diagnosis. And does not raise awareness of the types of cancer that are actually caused by alcohol abuse !

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament is not responsible for the content of balancenortheast.co.uk.

Balancenortheast is funded by local authorities in the north east. You could raise this issue with your local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
